Button - Secondary

Component status
Verified
Last releasedMarch 12, 2020
Current version@spectrum-css/button@3.0.0-beta.1
View guidelines
Spectrum website
View repository
GitHub
View package
npm

Usage notes

The secondary button is for low emphasis.

Variants

Secondary
Verified

Show markup
<button class="spectrum-Button spectrum-Button--secondary">
  <span class="spectrum-Button-label">Button</span>
</button>

<button class="spectrum-Button spectrum-Button--secondary" disabled>
  <span class="spectrum-Button-label">Button</span>
</button>

Secondary (quiet)
Verified

Show markup
<button class="spectrum-Button spectrum-Button--secondary spectrum-Button--quiet">
  <span class="spectrum-Button-label">Button</span>
</button>

<button class="spectrum-Button spectrum-Button--secondary spectrum-Button--quiet" disabled>
  <span class="spectrum-Button-label">Button</span>
</button>
